item.title: Bloodguard Shield
item.fluff: As your foe's weapon strikes deep, this bronze shield flares red and covers you in a protective aura

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy scores a critical hit against you
Effect: You gain resist 5 all until the end of your next turn.
Level 12: Resist 10 all
Level 22: Resist 15 all

item.title: Bracers of Enforced Regret
item.fluff: When an enemy presses you, the power of these simple steel bracers lets you turn the tables

block.name: Property
block.line: While you're marked, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls against the enemy that marked you.
Level 12: +2 bonus

item.title: Bracers of Might Striking
item.fluff: These enchanted armbands increase the damage you deal with simple melee attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit with a melee basic attack, you gain a +2 item bonus to the damage roll.
Level 12: +3 item bonus
Level 22: +4 item bonus

item.title: Bracers of Respite
item.fluff: Commonly worn by combat medics, these white linen armguards spread healing benefits

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: An ally adjacent to you regainst hit points
Effect: Melee 1 (you, or one ally other than the triggering ally); The target regains 1d8+1 hit points.
Level 12: 2d8+2 hit points
Level 22: 4d8+4 hit points

item.title: Darkleaf Shield
item.fluff: Shadowfell gravetrees provide the tightly woven branches and black leaves that form this shield

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to AC during the surprise round, and the first nonsurprise round of each encounter.
Level 12: +2 item bonus
Level 22: +3 item bonus

item.title: Fighting Shield
item.fluff: This shield quivers on your arm, eager to taste blood with its sharpened edge

block.name: Property
block.line: This shield can be used as a one-handed melee weapon in the Heavy Blade group with a +3 proficiency bonus that deals 1d6 damage, and has the Off-hand weapon property.

item.title: Floating Shield
item.fluff: Enameled with images of ocean waves, this shield eases your way in water

block.name: Property
block.line: You do not sink beneath the surface of any liquid, unless you choose to do so.
You also gain a +2 bonus to Athletics checks to swim, and to Endurance checks to swim for an extended period of time.
Finally, you can swim at your speed when swimming on the surface of the water.

item.title: Heart-Touch Bracelets
item.fluff: These elegant gold bracelets feel warm to the touch and, as soon as you don one, you feel the vacancy of the other until it too is worn and your bracelet beats with the pulse of another heart

block.name: Property
block.line: When you wear one of these bracelets, you are aware if the other bracelet in the pair is worn. If that person's heart beats, you feel it in your bracelet, allowing you to know how fast or slow the person's heart is beating.
In addition, you gain a +2 bonus to Insight checks made against the wearer of the other bracelet, and you are aware if that person is bloodied, stunned, dazed, or unconscious.
The wearer of the other bracelet in the pair is aware of the same things in regard to you as long as you wear the bracelet.
The price covers a single pair of heart-toouch bracelets.

item.title: Jousting Shield
item.fluff: This grooved and angled shield acts as a bulwark against all attempts to alter a charger's course

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 against opportunity attacks you trigger from charging, and are immune to forced movement while charging.
After charging, you reduce all forced movement against you by 2 squares until the start of your next turn.
Level 12: Resist 10, and reduce by 3 squares
Level 22: Resist 20, and reduce by 4 squares

item.title: Preservation Shield
item.fluff: This light wood shield displays an insignia of two crossed arrows, one fletched green and the other red

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You and each ally within 5 squares gain temporary hit points equal to the number of healing surges you have remaining.

item.title: Razor Shield
item.fluff: Ringed in blades, this round shield is as almost as much a weapon as an item of defense

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger:An enemy hits you with a melee attack, or you hit an enemy with a melee attack that requires wielding a shield
Effect: Melee special (triggering enemy); The target takes 1d8 + your Wisdom modifier damage.
Level 12: 2d8 + your Wisdom modifier damage. This power can be used as an opportunity reaction instead.
Level 22: This power is an encounter power instead.

item.title: Shield of Deflection
item.fluff: This enchanted shield reduces the damage you suffer from ranged and area attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 2 to all damage from ranged attacks and area attacks.
Level 12: Resist 5
Level 22: Resist 10

item.title: Shield of the Guardian
item.fluff: This oaken shield can guard an ally as well as protect you

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Melee touch (one ally); Until the end of your next turn, the target has a +1 power bonus to AC while adjacent to you.
Level 12: +2 power bonus
Level 22: +3 power bonus

item.title: Tusk Shield
item.fluff: With this shield on your arm, your deadly charge shatters your enemies' attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you charge, you gain a +2 item bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.
